K12D0744_H0687:116b-11: de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i skyes bu dpa'
K12D0744_H0687:116b-12: bo de la bla mas rjes su gnang ba byin
K12D0744_H0687:116b-13: la dam tshig shes pas 'khrul 'khor gyi bla ma'i
K12D0744_H0687:116b-14: phyag rgya'am / lha ma yin gyi phyag rgya bcings pas dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:116b-15: lha ma yin gyi chung ma dang khyim rnams su 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:116b-16: gzhan len gyis byas pa'i 'khrul 'khor thams cad las
K12D0744_H0687:116b-17: khyad par du 'phags pa'i rdzas rnams dbang du 'gyur
K12D0744_H0687:116b-18: ro // bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa rdo
K12D0744_H0687:116b-19: rje khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje sa 'og gi
K12D0744_H0687:116b-20: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste dang po'o
K12D0744_H0687:116b-21: ro // //// de nas gzhan yang phyag rgya dang sngags su gyur pa ni /
K12D0744_H0687:116b-22: sor mo phan tshun khu tshur du byas la mthe bong sbrul mgo'i rnam pa ltar byas pa ni /
K12D0744_H0687:116b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:116b-26: gnyen gyi phyogs su padma'i rigs kyi snying po'i phyag rgya dang sngags ni /
K12D0744_H0687:117a-2: byang phyogs su padma dhri ka /
K12D0744_H0687:117a-3: rdo rje'i rigs kyi snying po'i phyag rgya dang sngags ni /
K12D0744_H0687:117a-6: ming med sbyar la rtse gcig tu byas pa la bsdigs mdzub bzhag pa ni /
K12D0744_H0687:117a-7: rdo rje sa 'og gi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:117a-9: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0744_H0687:117a-10: na ma shtsanda badzra p'a na ye /
K12D0744_H0687:117a-11: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
K12D0744_H0687:117a-12: aom hr'i: po tri badzra p'a t'a la h'a n'a ma tha bhanydza pr'a t'a ya /
K12D0744_H0687:117a-13: m'a tsi ram badzra kro dha h'um phat/
K12D0744_H0687:117a-14: rtsa ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas lus thams cad byin gyis brlab bo //
K12D0744_H0687:117a-15: phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo las ming med kyi rtse
K12D0744_H0687:117a-16: mo sbyar la mthe chung sbas te gung mo dang
K12D0744_H0687:117a-17: mthe bo'i rtse sbyar la g-yon pa'i mdzub mos phyi
K12D0744_H0687:117a-18: nas bkug ste g-yas pa'i mdzub mo rdo rje'i rnam
K12D0744_H0687:117a-20: rdo rje dgra sta'i phyag rgya'o; ;g-yas pa'i lag pa
K12D0744_H0687:117a-21: dang g-yon pa'i lag pa mnyam par bzhag la mthe
K12D0744_H0687:117a-22: bo dang mdzub mo sbyar te g-yas pa'i mthe bos
K12D0744_H0687:117a-23: sor mo gsum gyi sen mo bkab la mnyam par
K12D0744_H0687:117a-24: mdzub mo g-yon pa'i mthe bo'i rtsa bar sbyar ba
K12D0744_H0687:117a-27: aom bi binda binda h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0744_H0687:117a-29: aom badzra p'a t'a la h'um phat spyi bor ro; ;aom ha:badzra h'um phat spyi gtsug go /
K12D0744_H0687:117a-30: aom hr'i bandha bandha sv'ah'a go cha'o /
K12D0744_H0687:117a-31: aom badzra badzra sa h'a shr'i shi ra se dzva
K12D0744_H0687:117a-32: li ta aa na la ha na bhanydza autstsh'a ta
K12D0744_H0687:117b-0: ya h'um phat/ mtshams bcings pa'i @117b sngags so //
K12D0744_H0687:117b-1: 'di dag dang rtsa ba'i phyag rgya sbyar bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:117b-2: lag mthil mnyam por byas te mthe bong dang mthe
K12D0744_H0687:117b-3: chung sbyar la sor mo lhag ma rnams rdo rje'i
K12D0744_H0687:117b-4: mtshan nyid du byas pa 'di ni /
K12D0744_H0687:117b-5: las thams cad pa sa gsum gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:117b-7: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0744_H0687:117b-8: na ma shtsanda badzra p'a na ye /
K12D0744_H0687:117b-9: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
K12D0744_H0687:117b-10: hi ri mi ri bi ra ra ri ni sv'ah'a /
K12D0744_H0687:117b-12: sor mo phan tshun sbyar la khu tshur du byas
K12D0744_H0687:117b-13: te gung mo brkyang la sbyar nas de'i phyi rol
K12D0744_H0687:117b-14: tu mdzub mo cung zad bskums la mthe bong gnyis
K12D0744_H0687:117b-16: dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:117b-18: na ma: sa manta buddha n'am ru dr'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0744_H0687:117b-19: dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo brkyang ba 'di ni /
K12D0744_H0687:117b-20: lha mo chu lon gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:117b-22: na ma: sa manta buddha nam au ma ye sv'ah'a;
K12D0744_H0687:117b-23: thal mo phye ba las mthe chung rtse mo sbyar
K12D0744_H0687:117b-24: la de'i rgyab tu srin lag sbyar nas de'i tshigs
K12D0744_H0687:117b-25: gsum par gung mo gnyis sbyar la de'i tshigs dang
K12D0744_H0687:117b-26: por mdzub mo gnyis sbyar ba ni /
K12D0744_H0687:117b-27: lha ma yin thams cad dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:117b-28: gnyis ka yang rdo rje mtshan nyid dang gcig tu sbyar bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:117b-29: lha ma yin thams cad kyi 'khrul 'khor 'joms shing 'byed pa'i phyag rgya ni /
K12D0744_H0687:117b-30: 'dir sor mo rnams rnam par bzlog la rus spal gyi rnam par bya ba ni /
K12D0744_H0687:117b-33: lha ma yin thams cad dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:118a-1: g-yon pa 'og tu bzhag la de'i steng du lag
K12D0744_H0687:118a-2: pa g-yas pa sbyar la mthe bong so sor bya
K12D0744_H0687:118a-3: ba 'di ni / rus sbal dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:118a-4: lag pa g-yon pa rdo rje'i tshul du bzhag la
K12D0744_H0687:118a-5: lag pa g-yas pa rdo rje thur du bzhag la
K12D0744_H0687:118a-6: thad kar sbyar bar byas pa 'di ni /
K12D0744_H0687:118a-7: rus sbal gyi phyag rgya gzhan no //
K12D0744_H0687:118a-8: bla 'og gi lag pa rnam par bzlog la snying
K12D0744_H0687:118a-9: gar sor mo gyen du byas la mthe bong mnyam
K12D0744_H0687:118a-12: rdo rje sa 'og gi mdzub mo steng du mnyam du gshibs pa ni /
K12D0744_H0687:118a-13: rdo rje sa 'og gi phyag rgya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:118a-14: khu tshur byas pa'i mdzub mo brkyang la gung mo
K12D0744_H0687:118a-15: dang srin lag gi steng du mthe bong sbyar ba
K12D0744_H0687:118a-17: de nyid las mthe bong mdzub mo'i rtsa bar sbyar ba ni /
K12D0744_H0687:118a-18: tho ba'i phyag rgya'o; ;khu tshur du byas la gung mo dang mthe bong mnyam por sbyar ba ni /
K12D0744_H0687:118a-19: bya rog gi mchu'i phyag rgya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:118a-20: lag pa g-yon pa rdo rje'i tshul du byas la
K12D0744_H0687:118a-21: snying ga'i phyogs su skyar la lag pa g-yas pa
K12D0744_H0687:118a-22: rdo rje steng du phyar nas rkang pa brkyang bskum
K12D0744_H0687:118a-24: rdo rje smod pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:118a-25: lag pa g-yon pa rdo rje rtse gcig pa snying
K12D0744_H0687:118a-26: ga'i phyogs su bzhag la lag pa g-yas pa'i sor
K12D0744_H0687:118a-27: mo gsum gyis rgyas btab nas brkyang bskum du gnas
K12D0744_H0687:118a-28: pa 'di ni / rdo rje gzhan la smod pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:118a-30: aom bi bindha bi bindha h'um phat/
K12D0744_H0687:118b-0: 'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og @118b gi rgyud ji snyed pa las /
K12D0744_H0687:118b-1: sngags dang phyag rgya'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
K12D0744_H0687:118b-2: gang gi tshe skyes bu dpa' bo dpal gyi sgor 'jug par 'dod par gyur na /
K12D0744_H0687:118b-3: des rdo rje khro bo'i bsnyen pa sngon du byas la phyis 'jug par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:118b-4: de la sngon du bsnyen pa ni /
K12D0744_H0687:118b-5: 'bum phrag brgyad slong mo za zhing smra ba bcad
K12D0744_H0687:118b-6: la sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang
K12D0744_H0687:118b-7: / de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa la dga' bas
K12D0744_H0687:118b-8: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po'i mchod rten
K12D0744_H0687:118b-9: / byas la / de'i mdun du ri bo'am /
K12D0744_H0687:118b-14: mchod rten gang yang rung ba'i gnas su byang chub
K12D0744_H0687:118b-15: kyi sems rjes su dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa
K12D0744_H0687:118b-16: thams cad la gsol ba btab nas sdig pa bshags
K12D0744_H0687:118b-17: te bla na med par bsngos la dam pa'i chos
K12D0744_H0687:118b-18: bton te rjes su dran par byas la mchod rten
K12D0744_H0687:118b-19: gyi las la rjes su gnas nas lus dang srog
K12D0744_H0687:118b-20: la dga' ba dor te dus gsum du phyag rgya
K12D0744_H0687:118b-21: dang / dbang bskur zhing dus gsum du khrus byas la /
K12D0744_H0687:118b-22: de'i lta bu'i tshul gyis bsnyen pa bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:118b-23: gang dag rmi lam mam mngon sum mtshan ma mthong na re zhig mi 'jug ste /
K12D0744_H0687:118b-25: glang po che chen pos zil gyis mnan pa'am /
K12D0744_H0687:118b-29: gang dag shi ba de lta bu mthong na /
K12D0744_H0687:119a-3: khros nas gza' chen po 'gugs pa'am /
K12D0744_H0687:119a-8: glang po che chen po dang /
K12D0744_H0687:119a-12: dgra'i dbus su phyin yang blta dka' bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12D0744_H0687:119a-13: de dag thams cad byams pa'i sems su gyur na de nas 'jug par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:119a-14: lha thams cad mngag gzhug tu 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:119a-16: khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje sa 'og gi sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
K12D0744_H0687:119a-17: bu ga'i mtshan nyid shes bya ba //
K12D0744_H0687:119a-18: chu 'bab gang dag rtse mo med //
K12D0744_H0687:119a-19: sa yi sgra ni sgrog pa dang //
K12D0744_H0687:119a-20: ltos 'phye'i gnas khang ji lta bar //
K12D0744_H0687:119a-21: rdo rje sa 'og mtshan nyid ni //
K12D0744_H0687:119a-22: mkhas pa yis ni mtshon par bya //
K12D0744_H0687:119a-23: rnam pa gang gi tshul gyis ni //
K12D0744_H0687:119a-24: bu ga rnams su brjod pa yi //
K12D0744_H0687:119a-25: 'jug pa na ni dog gyur la //
K12D0744_H0687:119a-26: bu ga der ni phyin pa na //
K12D0744_H0687:119a-27: kun nas sa gzhi mnyam pa ni //
K12D0744_H0687:119a-28: dpal gyi sgor ni rnam par bstan //
K12D0744_H0687:119a-29: gla rtsi mchog gi dri ldan zhing //
K12D0744_H0687:119a-30: 'khril shing lcug mas khyab pa dang //
K12D0744_H0687:119a-31: dri snum ldan pa'i kha dog can //
K12D0744_H0687:119a-32: dpal gyi sgor ni de bshad do //
K12D0744_H0687:119a-33: dri dang ldan zhing ngos brlan pa //
K12D0744_H0687:119a-35: zhugs pa tsam gyis yang dang yang //
K12D0744_H0687:119a-37: dpal gyi sgor ni de shes bya //
K12D0744_H0687:119a-38: de na dngul chu yod par bstan //
K12D0744_H0687:119a-39: bu ga yi ni sgor zhugs pas //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-0: @119b khro bo'i sems su gyur pa na //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-1: bu gar mdzes ma gnas pa yin //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-2: 'jigs pa med cing nga rgyal dang //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-3: rlom pa'i sems dang ldan pa yis //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-4: der ni zhugs pas tshim 'gyur na //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-5: bu gar dkar rdzas ldan pas khyab //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-6: bu ga dag ni gang dag tu //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-7: tshul med nga rgyal can khro ba //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-8: brtse med ser sna dang ldan zhing //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-9: phan tshun du ni rmongs byed pa'am //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-10: yang na bu ga'i sgo na ni //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-11: srin bu rnams ni rten gyur pa //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-12: der ni lto 'phye shes bya ste //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-13: bu ga der ni rnyed dka' 'o //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-14: gang dag dkar po'i bya ba ni //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-15: bug sgor yang dag gnas mthong na //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-16: de na bud med stong phrag gnas //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-17: gser ni rnam pa du ma gnas //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-18: nor bu mu tig byi ru dang //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-19: rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-20: bcud len du ma'i rdzas rnams ni //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-21: bu ga mchog der gnas pa yin //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-22: bu ga gang gi sgo la ni //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-23: rkang gdub sgra ni grags gyur na //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-24: bu ga de ni rin chen gang //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-25: bud med stong phrag de na gnas //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-26: bu ga gang gi sgo na ni //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-27: tshang bye'u gar byed gnas gyur na //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-28: bu ga de ni 'bras med shes //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-29: der ni blo ldan 'jug mi bya //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-30: gang gi nang na rkang gnyis ni //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-31: yang dag brten par mthong gyur na //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-32: der ni rab tu spro ba yis //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-33: mkhas pa yis ni 'jug par bya //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-35: mchog gi bcud len de na gnas //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-36: gang dag bu ga'i sgo la ni //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-37: gang po yang dag brten mthong nas //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-38: mthong nas ma mthong gyur na ni //
K12D0744_H0687:119b-39: bu ga des ni las kun byed //
K12D0744_H0687:120a-2: lto 'phye'i dbang phyug rnams mthong nas //
K12D0744_H0687:120a-3: dpa' bos der ni 'jug mi bya //
K12D0744_H0687:120a-4: de ma thag tu srog 'phrog byed //
K12D0744_H0687:120a-5: bu ga'i drung na 'jigs byed pa'i; ;ce spyang mi yi sgra grag na //
K12D0744_H0687:120a-6: der ni bag med mi bya ste //
K12D0744_H0687:120a-8: gang na khrung khrung sgra sgrog pa //
K12D0744_H0687:120a-9: bu ga'i nang na gnas gyur na //
K12D0744_H0687:120a-10: bu ga de ni kun gyis gang //
K12D0744_H0687:120a-11: 'dod pa rnams kyis rnam par brgyan //
K12D0744_H0687:120a-12: gang dag bu ga'i sgor brten pa'i //
K12D0744_H0687:120a-13: nya ni yang dag mthong gyur na //
K12D0744_H0687:120a-14: der ni brtson pas 'jug par bya //
K12D0744_H0687:120a-15: bud med stong gi bdag por 'gyur; ;bud med gzhon nu bum pa'i lag /
K12D0744_H0687:120a-16: bu ga'i sgor ni yang dag mthong //
K12D0744_H0687:120a-17: gdon mi za bar bu ga'i las //
K12D0744_H0687:120a-18: der ni grub par shes par bya //
K12D0744_H0687:120a-19: bu ga'i las la 'jug pa na //
K12D0744_H0687:120a-20: sgra skad chen po byung gyur na //
K12D0744_H0687:120a-21: bu ga de ni mtha' med shes //
K12D0744_H0687:120a-22: der ni grub par rjes su bstan //
K12D0744_H0687:120a-23: bu ga yi ni sgo ru yang //
K12D0744_H0687:120a-24: byi ba ka ka ru dkar po //
K12D0744_H0687:120a-25: gang dag lhan cig gnas mthong na; ;bu ga de ni las kun byed //
K12D0744_H0687:120a-26: bu ga'i sgo ru khyad par du //
K12D0744_H0687:120a-27: der ni ras kyi dri byung na //
K12D0744_H0687:120a-28: bu mo rnams ni stong phrag dag /
K12D0744_H0687:120a-29: dgu dang bdun brgya rnams dang ni //
K12D0744_H0687:120a-30: bcud kyis len dang gser dang ni //
K12D0744_H0687:120a-31: rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs gnas //
K12D0744_H0687:120a-33: k'a ra ba'i ra'i me tog rgyas //
K12D0744_H0687:120a-34: de na dngul chu gnas pa na //
K12D0744_H0687:120b-0: mkhas pa yis ni blang @120b bar bya; ;bu ga gang na sgre mo ni //
K12D0744_H0687:120b-1: gnas par mthong na bu ga de //
K12D0744_H0687:120b-3: der ni brtag dpyad mi bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:120b-4: bud med dag ni tshig stong dang //
K12D0744_H0687:120b-5: brgya phrag dag ni bcu gnyis ni //
K12D0744_H0687:120b-7: rtag tu rol pas spyod par byed //
K12D0744_H0687:120b-8: thams cad kyang ni tshul gcig kyang //
K12D0744_H0687:120b-9: kun gyis mthong na dga' ba'o //
K12D0744_H0687:120b-10: de la rin chen du ma dang //
K12D0744_H0687:120b-11: gos dag dang ni rgyan dag dang //
K12D0744_H0687:120b-12: bcud kyis len gyi gtso bo dang //
K12D0744_H0687:120b-13: dam pa sna tshogs mdzes pa'o //
K12D0744_H0687:120b-14: de nas ldong ros dag dang ni //
K12D0744_H0687:120b-15: mig sman dang ni dngul chu dang //
K12D0744_H0687:120b-16: mdzes pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs rnams //
K12D0744_H0687:120b-17: bu ga'i grong gi mchog na'o //
K12D0744_H0687:120b-18: bu ga de yi nang 'gram na //
K12D0744_H0687:120b-19: du ba 'thul ba mthong gyur na //
K12D0744_H0687:120b-20: gser ni rnam pa mang po dang //
K12D0744_H0687:120b-21: der ni dngul chur shes par bya; ;bu ga de yi logs la ni //
K12D0744_H0687:120b-22: tshangs pa kha dog sna tshogs pa'am //
K12D0744_H0687:120b-23: rang bzhin dkar po rten gyur na //
K12D0744_H0687:120b-24: bu ga de yang las kun byed //
K12D0744_H0687:120b-25: dbus nas mchi ma 'dzag pa yi //
K12D0744_H0687:120b-26: bya rog thon pa gang yin pa //
K12D0744_H0687:120b-27: de ni bdza' ba sna tshogs pa'i //
K12D0744_H0687:120b-28: bu ga ru ni rnam par bstan //

K12D0744_H0687:125a-36: ra'i 'o ma dang ka ra lhan cig tu badzra
K12D0744_H0687:125a-37: tandu la dang bslags la khro bo lan nyi shu
K12D0744_H0687:125a-38: rtsa gcig bzlas te zos la 'jug go /
K12D0744_H0687:125a-39: gang gi tshe lha chen po'i khang pa'i lha bshos
K12D0744_H0687:125a-40: yod pa las phyogs te g-yas phyogs nas bskor la
K12D0744_H0687:125b-2: rnga'i dbyug gu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas la brdung par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:125b-3: gang gi tshe rnga'i sgra grags pa la bud med kyi tshogs ma 'ongs na /
K12D0744_H0687:125b-4: de nas lha chen po'i lho'i sa la bsdad la 'khrul 'khor gyi bla ma bzla'o //
K12D0744_H0687:125b-5: de'i skad cig la bud med kyi tshogs thams cad
K12D0744_H0687:125b-6: thad du 'ongs te mchod yon sbrengs nas skyes bu
K12D0744_H0687:125b-7: dpa' bo rnams 'jug par byed do //
K12D0744_H0687:125b-8: zhugs pa dang ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs shig ces 'phrin yig gdas par byed do //
K12D0744_H0687:125b-9: dkon mchog gsum dang 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje rtag tu rjes su dran pas bzla bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:125b-10: 'di ltar bud med kyi dbus su nyi ma dang /
K12D0744_H0687:125b-12: skar ma gnas kyi bar du sdod do //
K12D0744_H0687:125b-14: des sbyar sman gyis bsku ba byugs la /
K12D0744_H0687:125b-17: grub pa'i rdzas gang 'dod pa de gzung bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:125b-18: gzhu'i 'khrul 'khor las byol la yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas la bsnun par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:125b-19: de lta na yang mi ltung na /
K12D0744_H0687:125b-20: de nas 'khrul 'khor de la lto'i rtsa ba nas bsnun par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:125b-22: thog mar 'khor rnams sngon du btang la bdag nyid phyi nas 'jug par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:125b-23: mar me'i mchod sdong la sbyin sreg gi gi thab nas me sbar la 'jug go /
K12D0744_H0687:126a-0: khron pa rnams su 'khrul 'khor gyi bla ma stong phrag @126a *//
K12D0744_H0687:126a-2: khron pa de na yang ta la'i shing sbrul gyi
K12D0744_H0687:126a-3: rnam par snang ba la dri ma med pa'i mig
K12D0744_H0687:126a-9: gi wang rnams mnyam por skar ma rgyal la sbyar
K12D0744_H0687:126a-10: ba'i ril bur byas la sman gyi mchog dug 'joms
K12D0744_H0687:126a-11: pa de shes rab can gyis bsnun par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:126a-12: de nas ta la'i shing nyid du 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:126a-14: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal to //
K12D0744_H0687:126a-15: 'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal ba'i 'khrul 'khor 'ba' zhig ba'i le'u ste lnga ba'o ////
K12D0744_H0687:126a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod
K12D0744_H0687:126a-17: yul gyi gnas na gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag
K12D0744_H0687:126a-18: na rdo rje dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so //
K12D0744_H0687:126a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa /
K12D0744_H0687:126a-21: ji ltar lha ma yin thams cad kyi dregs pa gzhom pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:126a-22: dam tshig la gnas par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje khro bo'i dam tshig 'di sgrogs shig /
K12D0744_H0687:126a-23: de nas lag na rdo rje stan las langs te
K12D0744_H0687:126a-24: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo
K12D0744_H0687:126a-25: g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan
K12D0744_H0687:126a-26: 'das la btud nas thal mo sbyar te phyag byas
K12D0744_H0687:126a-27: nas rdo rje khro bos smras so //
K12D0744_H0687:126a-28: smras pa tsam gyis rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po
K12D0744_H0687:126b-0: me lce gcig tu 'bar te 'jig @126b rten gsum
K12D0744_H0687:126b-1: bkang nas sgra chen po phyung ngo //
K12D0744_H0687:126b-2: de nas de lta bu'i mtshan ma chen po des
K12D0744_H0687:126b-3: lha ma yin 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad 'dir
K12D0744_H0687:126b-4: lha dang lha ma yin rnams g-yul 'gyed par gyur
K12D0744_H0687:126b-6: lha ma yin rnams la thags bzang ris dang /
K12D0744_H0687:126b-13: rus sbal la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:126b-14: gzhan yang bgrod dka' chen po dang /
K12D0744_H0687:126b-17: snang ba'i phreng ba can dang /
K12D0744_H0687:126b-18: 'phrog byed ser skya la sogs pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:126b-20: lha ma yin gyi rjes su dpyod pa dpung dang bcas pa /
K12D0744_H0687:126b-21: gzhon pa dang bcas pa 'dus te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so //
K12D0744_H0687:126b-22: lha rnams kyis kyang de lta bu'i mtshan ma chen po de mthong nas lha'i tshogs gzhan rnams dang /
K12D0744_H0687:126b-23: rang rang gi rnam par rtog pa ji lta de
K12D0744_H0687:126b-24: ltar lha rnams kyi dbang po la smra zhing bcom
K12D0744_H0687:126b-25: ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te thal mo
K12D0744_H0687:126b-26: sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K12D0744_H0687:126b-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa /
K12D0744_H0687:126b-29: gang 'dir dus la bab bar shes na /
K12D0744_H0687:126b-30: deng 'dir sa 'og gi dbang bskur ba rnga'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya bas byin gyis rlobs shig /
K12D0744_H0687:126b-31: skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:127a-1: 'das; bdag gis theg pa chen po la dad pa
K12D0744_H0687:127a-2: dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu'i don du dam tshig
K12D0744_H0687:127a-3: bstan pas byin gyis brlab lags kyi //
K12D0744_H0687:127a-4: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
K12D0744_H0687:127a-5: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis
K12D0744_H0687:127a-6: brlab tu gsol / de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis kyang byin gyis brlabs lags so //
K12D0744_H0687:127a-7: de bdag gis kyang byin gyis brlab par bgyi'o //
K12D0744_H0687:127a-8: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su bsdad la gnas mchog der mgal dum dang /
K12D0744_H0687:127a-9: rdo ba dor te 'khrul 'khor dang shing sdong spangs la /
K12D0744_H0687:127a-13: dbang bskur ba byas pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:127a-16: gnod sbyin mchod pa byas pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:127a-17: dge 'dun dbang bskur ba'i gnas rnams dor la /
K12D0744_H0687:127a-18: der yang chu snum pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:127a-22: snum pa'i phyogs mtshon par byas la /
K12D0744_H0687:127a-23: de rnams su sngon bzhin du byi dor dang yongs
K12D0744_H0687:127a-24: su sbyang ba byas te tshon sna lngas gru bzhi
K12D0744_H0687:127a-25: sgo bzhi ba'i ri mo bris la dkyil 'khor gyi
K12D0744_H0687:127a-26: dbus cha brgyad par byas te yungs kar dkar pos
K12D0744_H0687:127a-27: byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje gra bzhir gzhag par
K12D0744_H0687:127a-28: bya'o // de'i dbus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bri bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:127a-29: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas kyi drung du 'phags pa
K12D0744_H0687:127b-0: phyag na rdo @127b rje 'bar ba'i phyag can gzhag
K12D0744_H0687:127b-1: par bya'o // de'i drung du khro bo'i rgyal po
K12D0744_H0687:127b-2: rdo rje sa 'og rdo rje dgra sta'i phyag can
K12D0744_H0687:127b-3: par bya'o // gzhag par bya'o // bcom ldan 'das
K12D0744_H0687:127b-4: kyi g-yon gyi drung du byang chub sems dpa' dri
K12D0744_H0687:127b-5: ma med pa'i blo gros rnga yab kyi phyag can
K12D0744_H0687:127b-6: par bya'o // gzhag par bya'o // gzhag par bya'o
K12D0744_H0687:127b-7: // bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du lha chen po
K12D0744_H0687:127b-8: chung ma dang bcas pa gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:127b-9: de'i mdun du khyu mchog kha 'og tu lta ba nag po'i gos can gzhag go /
K12D0744_H0687:127b-10: shar gyi sgor sman thams cad gzhag par bya ste /
K12D0744_H0687:127b-18: sman chen po 'di brgyad gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:127b-25: rtsangs pa dang me 'bar ba dang /
K12D0744_H0687:127b-26: dngul chu rnams gnas rnams su go rim bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:127b-29: rigs kyi bud med kyi dbyibs su gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:127b-42: zhags pa la sogs pa bri bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:127b-43: de'i lho'i sgor lha ma yin brgyad bri ste /
K12D0744_H0687:128a-5: nub kyi sgor 'khrul 'khor sum cu lhag pa'i stong gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:128a-6: de la 'khrul 'khor chen po brgyad rnam pa dang bcas pa gzhag par bya ste /
K12D0744_H0687:128a-13: gzhi'i 'khrul 'khor la lta ba bri bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:128a-21: dpal gyi sgo 'di brgyad rnam pa dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:128a-22: gdong gi 'khrul 'khor mchu btsum pa bri bar bya'o;
K12D0744_H0687:128a-23: ;lug gi spyi bor phur bu'i 'khrul 'khor bri bar
K12D0744_H0687:128a-24: bya'o // mda' dang bcas pa'i gzhu dang /
K12D0744_H0687:128a-25: chu rgyun gyi lte bar phur bu gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:128a-30: 'od 'phro ba'i rnam pa bri bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:128a-31: de'ang go rim bzhin du rnam pa dang bcas pa'i
K12D0744_H0687:128a-32: 'khrul 'khor la phur bu bsnun pa bri bar bya'o
K12D0744_H0687:128a-33: // de nas byang gi sgor bu ga rnam pa dang bcas pa bri bar bya ste /
K12D0744_H0687:128b-0: ba lang gi dgod @128b dang; dkyil 'khor dang /
K12D0744_H0687:128b-1: ma byas pa'i gdong gi rnam pa ste /
K12D0744_H0687:128b-2: dpal gyi sgo brgyad phur bus bsnun pa'i rnam pa dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:128b-3: de'i dbus su chu rgyun dbyug gu dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:128b-4: gra bzhir sgo bral bzhi bri bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:128b-6: bden bral du du ba'i thab khung ngo //
K12D0744_H0687:128b-7: rlung du chu'i thab khung ngo //
K12D0744_H0687:128b-8: dbang ldan du sbrul gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:128b-9: de nas ras dkar po phra ba dri zhim pa'i gdugs bzhi dang /
K12D0744_H0687:128b-10: dbyig dang bcas pa'i nor bus byin gyis brlabs la
K12D0744_H0687:128b-11: shin tu bri zhim pa'i chu gtsang mas yongs su
K12D0744_H0687:128b-12: bkang ba'i bum pa rtsa ba nag po med cing
K12D0744_H0687:128b-13: dri zhim pos yongs su byugs pa gzhag go /
K12D0744_H0687:128b-14: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs gra bzhi ba'i shar gyi
K12D0744_H0687:128b-15: sgor gnas gcig tu lha ma yin gyi dbang po
K12D0744_H0687:128b-17: bgrod dka' chen po bri bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:128b-18: de'i lhor rnam par snang byed dang /
K12D0744_H0687:128b-19: ha ri ta'i pi ga la zhes bya ba bri bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:128b-20: de'i nub kyi sgor snang ba'i phreng ba can dang /
K12D0744_H0687:128b-22: lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag bri bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:128b-23: de nas mchod pa sha med pa'i lha bshos bya ba ste /
K12D0744_H0687:128b-27: dri ma med pa'i blo gros la'o //
K12D0744_H0687:129a-1: ji ltar 'byor pas lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams kyi gtor ma dang /
K12D0744_H0687:129a-2: 'byung po thams cad ba'i gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:129a-3: de nas dri thams cad dang /
K12D0744_H0687:129a-5: phye ma la sogs pa'i lha bshos sbyin no //
K12D0744_H0687:129a-6: de nas lha rnams 'ching bar byed pa'i sngags ni /
K12D0744_H0687:129a-7: aom badzra garbhe badzra garbhye phat h'a dhi ki ri ni sv'a h'a /
K12D0744_H0687:129a-8: de nas mtshams bzhir lag pa phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pas log 'dren bcing bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:129a-10: na ma: sa manta badzra n'am/
K12D0744_H0687:129a-11: aom bdzra p'a la ya sv'a h'a /
K12D0744_H0687:129a-12: zhes lan gsum du brjod do //
K12D0744_H0687:129a-13: rdo rje lcags sgrog gis bcing ba dang dgug par ba'o //
K12D0744_H0687:129a-14: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K12D0744_H0687:129a-15: lha thams cad me tog gis dgug par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:129a-16: na ma stree ya dhvi kva n'am/
K12D0744_H0687:129a-17: sarba ta th'a ga t'a n'am/
K12D0744_H0687:129a-18: aa na la bh'a k'a n'am na ma: sv'a h'a /
K12D0744_H0687:129a-19: de nas skyes bu dpa' bos sngags 'dis bsrung bar bya ste /
K12D0744_H0687:129a-20: aom du rba re dzva la dzva la na mo badzra s'a ga r'a ya sv'a h'a /
K12D0744_H0687:129a-21: 'dis bsrungs nas ras dkar po phra ba dri zhim
K12D0744_H0687:129a-22: pos gdong g-yogs te 'khrul 'khor gyi bla ma bzlas
K12D0744_H0687:129a-23: la skyes bu dba' bos chos kyi gru lta bu'i
K12D0744_H0687:129a-24: shing lham gon te lag pa g-yas pa rus sbal
K12D0744_H0687:129a-25: gyi phyag rgya'am / lha ma yin gyi phyag rgya bcings la /
K12D0744_H0687:129a-26: rtsa ba nag po med pa'i bum pa lo ma
K12D0744_H0687:129a-27: bzang po dang ldan pa'i chus shar gyi sgor 'khrul
K12D0744_H0687:129a-28: 'khor gyi bla ma zlos shing dbang bskur bar bya'o
K12D0744_H0687:129b-0: // de ltar dbang @129b bskur ba de'i rjes su
K12D0744_H0687:129b-1: lag pa rdo rje'i phyag rgyas me tog dor ro
K12D0744_H0687:129b-2: // // me tog gang la lhung ba de'i lha'i rigs 'grub bo //
K12D0744_H0687:129b-3: de nas gdong bcings pa bkrol la dbang bskur ba
K12D0744_H0687:129b-4: de la skyes bu dpa' bos dkyil 'khor bstan par
K12D0744_H0687:129b-5: bya'o // lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams kyi gnas dang /
K12D0744_H0687:129b-11: de dag gi dkyil 'khor mthong na /
K12D0744_H0687:129b-13: lha ma yin gyi dam tshig gi tshogs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:129b-14: sngon du bsnyen pa ma byas kyang 'khrul 'khor 'jig par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:129b-15: de dag gis nye bar mi rtsed do //
K12D0744_H0687:129b-16: lha ma yin thams cad kyi khang pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:129b-22: sgyu ma la sogs pa'i 'khrul 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs pa des dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:129b-24: lha ma yin gyi sprul pa rnams sam //
K12D0744_H0687:129b-26: grub pas rab tu sbyar ba'i 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa ltung ba dang /
K12D0744_H0687:129b-27: dbang du byed nus par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:129b-28: gang dag dpal gyi sgor 'jug par 'dod na /
K12D0744_H0687:129b-29: sngon du rdo rje khro bos bzlas la dpal gyi sgor brjod pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:129b-30: sbyor bas sreg pa la sogs pa byas te ba
K12D0744_H0687:129b-31: ser skya'i lci bas dkyil 'khor byugs la gtor ma'i
K12D0744_H0687:129b-32: cho ga byas nas kha'i rnam pa'i thub khung gi
K12D0744_H0687:129b-33: steng du aa pa marga'i yam shing la me sbar
K12D0744_H0687:130a-1: 'bras bu stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:130a-2: des 'khrul 'khor thams cad ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:130a-3: de nas ra'i pags pa'i ral gu gyon la lag
K12D0744_H0687:130a-4: tu mtshon cha thogs te mar me'i mchod sdong ba
K12D0744_H0687:130a-5: lang gi rnga ma'i pags pa bcings la /
K12D0744_H0687:130a-6: shal ma li'i dog pas bkang ste dzyo ti smra ta'i 'bru mar la sngags 'dis me sbar ro //
K12D0744_H0687:130a-7: aom d'u bi d'u bi pra dzva li ni sv'a h'a /
K12D0744_H0687:130a-8: yang na bu ga gang gi rnam par gyur pa
K12D0744_H0687:130a-9: de bzhag la snags 'dis me spar te 'khrul khor
K12D0744_H0687:130a-11: kun pa mun nag thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:130a-12: bdag dang lhan cig spyod pa thams cad sman gyis lus byug go //
K12D0744_H0687:130a-27: rma bya'i gtsug phud dag ste /
K12D0744_H0687:130a-28: 'di rnams kyi phye ma sgyu ma thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ste /
K12D0744_H0687:130a-33: bud med kyi dbus su 'jug pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:130a-34: lha ma yin gyi bu mo 'gugs pa na cho
K12D0744_H0687:130a-35: ga phra mo byas te 'khrul 'khor gyi bla ma
K12D0744_H0687:130a-36: bzlas nas de'i rkang pa legs par byugs pas spyin
K12D0744_H0687:130b-0: la sogs pa'i 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'byung @130b bar
K12D0744_H0687:130b-1: 'gyur ro // der 'jug pa na sngon du badzra
K12D0744_H0687:130b-2: tantu li bklags la ka ra dang lhan cig tu
K12D0744_H0687:130b-4: lha'i khang ba'i lha bshos mi bza'o //
K12D0744_H0687:130b-5: lha'i grang la g-yas phyogs nas bskor la 'gro'o //
K12D0744_H0687:130b-7: rnga'i 'og tu rul sbal gyi phyag rgya 'bri'o //
K12D0744_H0687:130b-8: dbyug gu la 'khrul 'khor gyi bla ma brgya rtsa
K12D0744_H0687:130b-9: brgyad bzlas te rkang pa g-yon pas mnan la khro
K12D0744_H0687:130b-10: bo'i rgyal po bzlos shing brdung ngo //
K12D0744_H0687:130b-11: 'jug pa'i sngon du mchod yon dang /
K12D0744_H0687:130b-17: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyis gsungs so //
K12D0744_H0687:130b-18: yang na phyag rgya'i steng du rkang pas rkang pa
K12D0744_H0687:130b-19: mnan la kha byang du phyogs te phyag rgya bcings
K12D0744_H0687:130b-21: rkang 'og tu nang na gnas pa thams cad dang /
K12D0744_H0687:130b-22: lha ma yin gyi bu mo nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:130b-23: ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngul chu dang /
K12D0744_H0687:130b-25: grub pa'i rdzas rnams ster ro //
K12D0744_H0687:130b-26: de nas ji ltar 'dod pa'i dus de srid du de rnams dang lhan cig tu gnas so //
K12D0744_H0687:130b-28: sems can la phan par byed pa'i rdzas mdzes pa
K12D0744_H0687:130b-29: ji ltar 'dod pa bzung la gang 'dod pa de
K12D0744_H0687:130b-30: gdon mi za bar 'dong bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:131a-0: de nas 'khrul 'khor gyi dbyibs kyi rnam pa sems la bris la lha ma yin gyi phyag @131a *//
K12D0744_H0687:131a-1: rgya'am; gzhan gyi phyag rgya bcings la bzla'o //
K12D0744_H0687:131a-2: de'i skad cig la snang ba chen po byung nas sgo grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:131a-3: som nyi med par ji ltar 'dod par 'gro'o; ;dpag
K12D0744_H0687:131a-4: tu med pa'i stobs kyis pha rol gnon par 'gyur
K12D0744_H0687:131a-5: ro // yid ltar mgyogs pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:131a-6: ji ltar 'dod pa'i rgyal po gdul dka' bar 'dul bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:131a-7: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal to //
K12D0744_H0687:131a-8: rdo rje rnga bo che sa 'og gi dkyil 'khor
K12D0744_H0687:131a-9: zhes bya ba don yod pa lha ma yin gyi
K12D0744_H0687:131a-10: gtso bo skyes bu dpa' bo rnams dbang bskur ba
K12D0744_H0687:131a-12: rdo rje rnga bo che sa 'og gi phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba las /
K12D0744_H0687:131a-13: don yod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o ////
K12D0744_H0687:131a-14: de nas rdo rje sa 'og las //
K12D0744_H0687:131a-15: gsungs pa'i dbang bskur rab bshad bya //
K12D0744_H0687:131a-17: rnga yi sgra dbyangs bri bar bya //
K12D0744_H0687:131a-18: de nas rus sbal phyag rgya gzhag /
K12D0744_H0687:131a-19: yungs kar dkar po'i steng du'o; ;mchod pa'i cho ga byas nas su //
K12D0744_H0687:131a-20: bra ba'i ras kyi brgyan pa yi //
K12D0744_H0687:131a-21: bum pa rtsa ba mi nag pa //
K12D0744_H0687:131a-22: rin chen sman gyis yongs bkang la //
K12D0744_H0687:131a-23: gtor ma g-yas bskor byin nas su //
K12D0744_H0687:131a-24: phyag rgya'i steng du gzhag par bya //
K12D0744_H0687:131a-25: sngon du bshad pa'i cho ga yis //
K12D0744_H0687:131a-26: dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya //
K12D0744_H0687:131a-27: lha dang spyan drang byas nas su //
K12D0744_H0687:131a-28: ji ltar rigs pa'i mchod pa bya //
K12D0744_H0687:131b-0: @131b bya; ;byang chub sems ni bskyed nas su //
K12D0744_H0687:131b-1: sdig pa yang ni bshags par bya //
K12D0744_H0687:131b-2: de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing //
K12D0744_H0687:131b-3: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor phyi rol tu //
K12D0744_H0687:131b-4: grub nga'i rdo rje'i chu yis su //
K12D0744_H0687:131b-5: de nas dbang bskur ba ni bya //
K12D0744_H0687:131b-6: ji lta ba yi dbang bskur la //
K12D0744_H0687:131b-7: de lta bu yi bum pa dgod //
K12D0744_H0687:131b-8: gang gi dkyil 'khor cho ga la //
K12D0744_H0687:131b-9: phyag rgya gtor ma'i cho gar bshad //
K12D0744_H0687:131b-10: dbang bskur phyir ni 'bad pa yis //
K12D0744_H0687:131b-11: phyag rgya bcings la gnas par bya //
K12D0744_H0687:131b-12: sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas su //
K12D0744_H0687:131b-13: dngul chu'i bya ba spang bar bya //
K12D0744_H0687:131b-14: mdo sde'i rjes 'brang cho ga yis //
K12D0744_H0687:131b-15: mchod rten gyi ni las bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:131b-16: grogs rnams kun dang rnam grol te /
K12D0744_H0687:131b-17: slong mo za zhing mnyam bzhag pas //
K12D0744_H0687:131b-18: myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
K12D0744_H0687:131b-19: phyag na rdo rjes byin gyis rlob //
K12D0744_H0687:131b-20: 'phags pa rdo rjes 'og gi sgrub par byed pa'i dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o ////
K12D0744_H0687:131b-21: de nas 'dir bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum gyis zhabs la rjed la /
K12D0744_H0687:131b-22: khro bo chen po rdo rje sa 'og gi bris sku'i cho ga brjod par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:131b-23: gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu ba lang gi
K12D0744_H0687:131b-24: chus bkrus te yan lag brgyad pa'i gso sbyong la
K12D0744_H0687:131b-25: gnas pa'i thags mkhan gyis 'thag par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:131b-26: ras su gyur pa dang sngags pa'i khru do pa'i
K12D0744_H0687:131b-27: srid la zheng du khru gang dang sor brgyad pa
K12D0744_H0687:131b-28: la ri mo mkhan yan lag brgyad pa'i gso sbyong
K12D0744_H0687:131b-29: dang ldan pa la srung ba byas te mchod yon
K12D0744_H0687:132a-1: ldan 'das autpa la sngon po'i kha dog can khro bo spyan dmar po //
K12D0744_H0687:132a-2: ya sos ma mchu mnan pa /
K12D0744_H0687:132a-9: rin po che'i cod pan gyis spras pa'i ral pa'i thor tshugs can /
K12D0744_H0687:132a-10: mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa'i mchod phyir thogs 'chang ba //
K12D0744_H0687:132a-11: gdu bu dang 'khyil pas rna ba brgyan pa /
K12D0744_H0687:132a-12: ral ba'i thor tshugs kyi steng du padma'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
K12D0744_H0687:132a-14: bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa bri bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:132a-15: lag pa g-yas par rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rje'o //
K12D0744_H0687:132a-17: g-yon par padma'i mdzod kyi nang du yid bzhin gyi nor bus gang ba 'dzin pa'o //
K12D0744_H0687:132a-18: g-yon pa'i gnyis pa lha ma yin sdigs pa'i mdzub mo'o //
K12D0744_H0687:132a-19: rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du padma chen po'i steng na bzhugs pa /
K12D0744_H0687:132a-20: 'gran zla dang bral ba gcig pu'o //
K12D0744_H0687:132a-21: g-yas pa'i lag pa'i 'og tu sgrub byed padme'i steng
K12D0744_H0687:132a-22: du pus mo btsugs pa padma'i sdong bus brgyan pa'i
K12D0744_H0687:132a-23: lag pa can bri bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:132a-24: de nas sngar bshad pa'i gnas rnams su rjes su mthun pa'i rab tu gnas pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:132a-25: mchod pa byas la ring bsrel can gyis mchod rten gyi mdun du 'bum phrag bcu bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:132a-26: de nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:132b-0: dpal gyi sgor bris sku @132b gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:132b-2: dpal dang ldan pas ba lang gi pags pa'i stan
K12D0744_H0687:132b-3: la gos dmar po gyon te dug dang khrag bsres
K12D0744_H0687:132b-4: la mi'i rus pas bcus shing brgya phra brgyad sreg
K12D0744_H0687:132b-5: blug bya'o // bu ga'i 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:132b-9: bud med kyi grong du 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:132b-10: 'khrul 'khor rnams bka' bzhin du sgrub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:132b-11: phyag rgyas lha thams cad 'gugs par byed do //
K12D0744_H0687:132b-12: 'di lta bus gang ji ltar sams pa'i bsam pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:132b-13: gang ji ltar sems pa'i las dang /
K12D0744_H0687:132b-14: gang ji ltar sems pa'i cho ga thams cad bka' bzhin du byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:132b-16: gang zhig klu'i rgyal po bris nas de'i mdun du bris sku bkram ste /
K12D0744_H0687:132b-17: rkang pa g-yon pas mnan la stong phrag brgya bzla bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:132b-18: klu'i rgyal po de 'ongs nas ci bgyi zhes smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:132b-20: nga'i bka' bzhin du gyis shig ces brjod do //
K12D0744_H0687:132b-21: des ci bsgo ba nyan par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:132b-22: klu thams cad kyi khang pa rnams su 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:132b-23: de dag la 'di dag thams cad gyis shig ces bka'i bsgo ba nyan no //
K12D0744_H0687:132b-24: de bzhin du lus ngan rnams dang /
K12D0744_H0687:132b-28: byar 'dabs rnams kyi gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa thams cad bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:133a-1: grags mkhar bdun gyi rtse mo'i sa bsdus te /
K12D0744_H0687:133a-2: de las nam mkha' lding byas la ring bsrel gyi
K12D0744_H0687:133a-3: snying po can gyi drung du bris sku bkram ste
K12D0744_H0687:133a-4: dgon pa'am / gzhan gang yang rung bar de'i steng du bsdad la stong phrag brgya bzla'o //
K12D0744_H0687:133a-6: sred med kyi bu chen po stobs su 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:133a-7: sbrul pa chen po byed do; ;thams cad grub pa'i
K12D0744_H0687:133a-8: rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar
K12D0744_H0687:133a-9: 'gyur ro // las thams cad pa lta bur tshe dpag tu med pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:133a-11: 'dod na sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye ba dang /
K12D0744_H0687:133a-12: de nas yang shi 'phos nas ting nge 'dzin gyi
K12D0744_H0687:133a-13: stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen
K12D0744_H0687:133a-14: gyis rjes su 'dzin par 'gyur ro; ;'phags pa rdo
K12D0744_H0687:133a-15: rje sa 'og gi rgyud kyi sprin chen po 'bebs
K12D0744_H0687:133a-16: par byed cing rkang 'og thams cad kyi nang du
K12D0744_H0687:133a-17: rig pa dang / spyod pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:133a-18: rin po che'i 'byung khungs thams cad kyi gtso bo dang /
K12D0744_H0687:133a-20: 'khor lo 'dzin pa ltar gcig tu dpa' ba'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:133a-22: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal to //
K12D0744_H0687:133a-23: 'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las /
K12D0744_H0687:133a-24: thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o ////
K12D0744_H0687:133a-25: de nas lha ma yin thams cad kyis mchod pa
K12D0744_H0687:133b-0: mchog tu gsang ba'i bris sku bshad @133b par bya'o
K12D0744_H0687:133b-1: // gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i kha tshar ma bcad
K12D0744_H0687:133b-2: cing skra med pa'i ras la ri mo mkhan gso
K12D0744_H0687:133b-3: sbyong dang ldan pas kha dog ma 'dres pa snod
K12D0744_H0687:133b-5: kha dog dmar po phyag bzhi pa sbrul gyi ska rags kyis brgyan pa /
K12D0744_H0687:133b-6: sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can /
K12D0744_H0687:133b-7: sprin gsar pa lta bu mchu sbyar pa /
K12D0744_H0687:133b-8: dpral bar khro gnyer bsdus pa /
K12D0744_H0687:133b-9: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i mgo bo'i phreng ba can /
K12D0744_H0687:133b-12: g-yon pa'i sdigs mdzub kyis dpal gyi sgo'i bu ga gsal bar byed pa /
K12D0744_H0687:133b-13: g-yon pa'i gnyis par lto 'gro chen po bskyil ba'i zhags pa 'chang ba'o //
K12D0744_H0687:133b-16: drag po'i gzugs can ma mos par gyur pas bri bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:133b-18: stong pa'i phyogs me tog dang 'bras bur ldan pa'am /
K12D0744_H0687:133b-19: bu ga'i sgor 'bum phrag drug bzla'o //
K12D0744_H0687:133b-20: de'i sngon du ji ltar bris sku de gdug pa can 'gas kyang ma mthong ba de ltar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:133b-21: de nas rdo rjes bsnun pa'i shing gis sa bsregs
K12D0744_H0687:133b-22: la phyogs der yungs kar dkar po la rdo rje
K12D0744_H0687:133b-23: khro bos yongs su bsngags te gdab par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:133b-24: de las skyes pa'i sa bon de gzung bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:133b-25: de nas rdo rjes bsnun pa'i shing la me sbar
K12D0744_H0687:133b-26: te rdo rje'i rnam pa'i thab khung du yungs kar
K12D0744_H0687:133b-27: de dang / tsandan dmar po bsres la stong phrag brgyad sreg blugs bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:134a-1: pa la lha ma yin gyi grong na gnas pa'i
K12D0744_H0687:134a-2: bud med las dro ba dang ldan pas nges par
K12D0744_H0687:134a-4: de rnams dang lhan cig tu 'jug par mi bya'o; ;de rnams dang smra bar mi bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:134a-5: nyi ma lnga pa la sreg blugs byas pa'i mthar
K12D0744_H0687:134a-6: 'khrul 'khor thams cad la du ba 'byung bar 'gyur
K12D0744_H0687:134a-7: ro // de nas bud med de dag 'ongs te
K12D0744_H0687:134a-8: skyes bu dpa' bo byon par zhu zhes smra bar
K12D0744_H0687:134a-9: ro // 'gyur ro // der yang 'jug par mi bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:134a-11: nyi ma drug pa la khang pa thams cad la du ba 'thul bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:134a-12: 'khrul 'khor gyi gnas su ki ti ki ti zhes sgrog par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:134a-13: de nas bud med de rnams mig mchi mas gang bzhin du grub pa'i rdzas dang /
K12D0744_H0687:134a-14: rin po che thams cad bzung nas 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:134a-15: rang gi phyag rgya bstan la blang bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:134a-16: gal te mi 'dod na yang nyi ma bdun pa la sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:134a-17: gang sngon du zhugs pa de thams cad 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:134a-18: 'khrul 'khor thams cad ltung ba dang 'joms par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:134a-19: cho nges 'debs shing nges par 'od bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:134a-20: de dag la mi 'jigs pa byin la phyi nas 'jug par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:134a-21: 'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las /
K12D0744_H0687:134a-22: lha ma yin gyi bu mo la drag shul spyod pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o ////
K12D0744_H0687:134a-23: de nas gzhan yang rim par phye bar gyur pa ni /
K12D0744_H0687:134b-0: bcom ldan @134b 'das de nyid rnam par 'gyur ba stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can /
K12D0744_H0687:134b-2: lha ma yin chen po gzhan len gyi mgo la
K12D0744_H0687:134b-3: phyag gnyis kyis rdo rjes bsnun nas gsod par mdzad
K12D0744_H0687:134b-4: do // phyag g-yas par chu srin gyi mche ba'i
K12D0744_H0687:134b-5: rnam pa'i sor mo'i rtsa mo lcags kyus me tog
K12D0744_H0687:134b-7: g-yon pa bsdigs mdzub mdzad pa'o //
K12D0744_H0687:134b-8: de'i mdun du rdo rjes bsnun pa'i shing la me
K12D0744_H0687:134b-9: rab tu 'bar la me tog dang 'bras bu ldan
K12D0744_H0687:134b-10: par rdo rje rtse mo drug pa /
K12D0744_H0687:134b-11: nyi ma gcig tu phat kyi yi ge dang ldan par bsreg par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:134b-12: de bsregs pas lha ma yin thams cad kyi rigs kyi bud med cho nges 'debs shing /
K12D0744_H0687:134b-14: de rnams dang lhan cig tu 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:134b-15: de na lha mo g-yon phyogs pa zhes 'jig rten du grags pa'i rnam pa spra tshil dang /
K12D0744_H0687:134b-17: lugs phye bsres pa las gzugs brnyan byas la /
K12D0744_H0687:134b-18: rdo rjes bsnun pa'i shing la me sbar te /
K12D0744_H0687:134b-19: rdo rjes snying gar gzer la ji srid langs kyi bar de srid du bsro bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:134b-21: rdo rje'i rnam pa'i thab khung du shing de nyid
K12D0744_H0687:134b-22: la me sbar la dum bur gtubs te sbyin sreg
K12D0744_H0687:134b-23: bya'o; ;'khrul 'khor thams cad la du ba des reg
K12D0744_H0687:134b-25: slar 'byung ba'i mthu med par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:134b-26: gsang ba chen po 'di dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba dang /
K12D0744_H0687:135a-2: las kyis grib pa ma sbyangs pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:135a-3: dam tshig med pa la sbyin par mi bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:135a-6: spro ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:135a-7: kha na ma tho ba med pa'i yid dang /
K12D0744_H0687:135a-8: pha dang ma la gus pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:135a-9: byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:135a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa la bsam pa mi phyed pa dag la sbyin par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:135a-11: 'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las /
K12D0744_H0687:135a-12: lha ma yin gyi dbang po gzhan len gyi gtsug tu bri ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o ////
K12D0744_H0687:135a-13: de nas gzhan yang rim par phye bar gyur pa ni /
K12D0744_H0687:135a-14: h'a yang tsa'i dbus su yungs kar skya bos stong phrag brgyad sreg blugs bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:135a-15: de nas bud med rnams 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:135a-16: lag pa yongs su bzung nas 'jug par byed do //
K12D0744_H0687:135a-17: yang na gang 'dod pa de ster ro //
K12D0744_H0687:135a-18: 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas ri bo
K12D0744_H0687:135a-19: dang bgegs rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnam par 'joms
K12D0744_H0687:135a-21: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal to //
K12D0744_H0687:135a-22: 'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las /
K12D0744_H0687:135a-23: rdo rje nyid khu'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o ////
K12D0744_H0687:135a-24: de nas 'dir rtog pa gzhan yang bshad par bya ste /
K12D0744_H0687:135a-27: slong mo'i zas za zhing sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis 'bum phrag gsum bzla bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:135b-0: @135b bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:135b-1: rdo rjes bsnun pa'i shing la rdo rje khro bo tshon gang khro gnyer bsnyer zhing mchu bsdams pa /
K12D0744_H0687:135b-3: rdo rje 'phyar ba'i lag pa can /
K12D0744_H0687:135b-4: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo sdig mdzub tu byas pa /
K12D0744_H0687:135b-5: de nas zla ba cher gzas bzung nas mi mthong
K12D0744_H0687:135b-6: ba na dur khrod du tsandan dmar po'i stan nam
K12D0744_H0687:135b-7: / chu bo'i 'gram gyi 'jim pa la bzhugs par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:135b-8: de la rgya chen po'i mchod pa byas nas de'i
K12D0744_H0687:135b-9: mdun du rdo rjes bsnun pa'i shing la sor drug
K12D0744_H0687:135b-10: pa'i rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa byas te dri

K12D0744_H0687:140a-27: steng du lag pa 'og tu blta //
K12D0744_H0687:140a-28: phyi ru 'di yis bsnun par bya //
K12D0744_H0687:140a-29: yungs kar dang ni thal ba yis //
K12D0744_H0687:140a-30: bsnun pas sa ni g-yo 'gyur te //
K12D0744_H0687:140a-32: slar yang de yis bsnun pa yis //
K12D0744_H0687:140b-0: gdon mi za @140b bar ltung bar 'gyur //
K12D0744_H0687:140b-1: rkang pa mnyam par gnas byas nas //
K12D0744_H0687:140b-2: lag pa g-yon pa snying gar gzhag /
K12D0744_H0687:140b-3: gnas de phyi ru gar byas te //
K12D0744_H0687:140b-4: gang yang rung bas bsnun par bya //
K12D0744_H0687:140b-5: h'um dang ldan pa'i khro bo yis; ;phye mar gyur nas sa la ltung //
K12D0744_H0687:140b-6: rdo rje 'phyar ba'i cho ga yis //
K12D0744_H0687:140b-9: 'khrul 'khor med pa'i bu gar shes; ;nam mkha'i 'khrul 'khor gang bshad dang //
K12D0744_H0687:140b-10: gang yang dug gi rlung 'byung ba //
K12D0744_H0687:140b-11: de yang cho ga 'di yis su //
K12D0744_H0687:140b-12: mthong ba tsam gyis ltung bar 'gyur //
K12D0744_H0687:140b-13: dam tshig shes pa blo ldan des //
K12D0744_H0687:140b-14: yang na lha yi gnas mthong na //
K12D0744_H0687:140b-15: 'phyar ba'i phyag rgyas legs bsnun zhing //
K12D0744_H0687:140b-16: bskor zhing rab tu 'phen pa yis //
K12D0744_H0687:140b-17: 'byung po rnams ni dgug par bya //
K12D0744_H0687:140b-18: de bzhin dam tshig nyid kyang bstan //
K12D0744_H0687:140b-19: sgrub pa dbang bskur ldan pa dang //
K12D0744_H0687:140b-20: las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis //
K12D0744_H0687:140b-21: de nyid 'di ni bstan par bya //
K12D0744_H0687:140b-23: dpal gyi sgo yi sman rnams dag dngul chu grub pa'i mig sman sogs //
K12D0744_H0687:140b-24: de bzhin du bud med rnams dang ni //
K12D0744_H0687:140b-25: de nyid du ni mi snang 'gyur //
K12D0744_H0687:140b-26: gter dang gser 'gyur bu ga'i sgor //
K12D0744_H0687:140b-27: dbang du byed pa'ang de bzhin du //
K12D0744_H0687:140b-28: dbang bskur med pa'i blo ldan gyis //
K12D0744_H0687:140b-29: mthong yang thob par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:140b-30: lha ma yin gyi cho ga dang //
K12D0744_H0687:140b-32: ji ltar zhugs par gyur pa yi //
K12D0744_H0687:141a-2: bla ma la ni yon phul te //
K12D0744_H0687:141a-3: dri dang me tog mchod par bya //
K12D0744_H0687:141a-4: rdo rje chu yi chus bkang nas //
K12D0744_H0687:141a-5: phra ba'i ras kyis mgrin bcings pa'i //
K12D0744_H0687:141a-6: bum pa ldan pa'i gzhan dag gis //
K12D0744_H0687:141a-7: mtshan nyid de yis dbang bskur bya //
K12D0744_H0687:141a-8: de nas rus sbal phyag rgya bcing //
K12D0744_H0687:141a-9: byin rlabs phyag rgya 'am de bzhin du //
K12D0744_H0687:141a-10: lha min phyag rgyas rjes gnang ni //
K12D0744_H0687:141a-11: bla mas byin pas don kun 'grub //
K12D0744_H0687:141a-13: sgyu ma yis ni brgyan pa rnams //
K12D0744_H0687:141a-14: 'byed dang rab tu byed pa ni //
K12D0744_H0687:141a-17: chu yis ma yin mes kyang min //
K12D0744_H0687:141a-18: glang po sogs min lto 'phyes min //
K12D0744_H0687:141a-20: ral gri dbyug gu mu sanda //
K12D0744_H0687:141a-21: chu bo aanydza ga sbrul min //
K12D0744_H0687:141a-23: gsang ba'i mtshams na rten rnams kyang //
K12D0744_H0687:141a-24: dbang bskur dam tshig dag gis ni //
K12D0744_H0687:141a-25: byin rlabs de la bsnun mi 'gyur //
K12D0744_H0687:141a-26: de yi mthu yis cung zad cig /
K12D0744_H0687:141a-28: de ni rig pa 'dzin pa yis //
K12D0744_H0687:141a-29: rigs kyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur //
K12D0744_H0687:141a-30: des na 'bad pa thams cad kyis //
K12D0744_H0687:141a-31: dbang bskur ba ni sbyar bar bya //
K12D0744_H0687:141a-32: don kun grub pa thob 'gyur zhing //
K12D0744_H0687:141a-33: de la lhas kyang byin gyis rlob //
K12D0744_H0687:141a-34: dman pa'i bya ba dor bar bya //
K12D0744_H0687:141a-35: mngon spyod kyi ni las kyang spang //
K12D0744_H0687:141b-0: @141b 'bebs dang dbang du bya ba dang /
K12D0744_H0687:141b-1: gdon gyi las kyang dor bar bya //
K12D0744_H0687:141b-2: blo dang ldan pas rgyun du bzlas //
K12D0744_H0687:141b-3: nyon mongs bral ba'i snyoms 'jug gis //
K12D0744_H0687:141b-4: 'phags pa rdo rjes 'og gi rgyud las /
K12D0744_H0687:141b-5: rig pa 'dzin pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o ////
K12D0744_H0687:141b-6: de nas khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rjes 'og gis
K12D0744_H0687:141b-7: byin gyis brlabs pa mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor
K12D0744_H0687:141b-8: bshad par bya'o // dbang ldan gyi phyogs su bltas te 'khod la /
K12D0744_H0687:141b-10: grong khyer gyi phyogs kyi mthar rdo dang /
K12D0744_H0687:141b-17: gnod sbyin la btsugs pa'i shing dang /
K12D0744_H0687:141b-20: kham phor gyi phung po dor te bkra shis kyi nyin par srung ba byas la //
K12D0744_H0687:141b-21: kha dog lngas khru bzhi pa /
K12D0744_H0687:141b-23: sgo'i mtshams su sgo khang dang /
K12D0744_H0687:141b-24: dkyil 'khor dbus zlum por gnas pa //
K12D0744_H0687:141b-26: phyogs bral gyi mtshams su zlum po ma yin pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
K12D0744_H0687:141b-27: cher brtags te ri mo rdo rjes byin gyis brlab bo //
K12D0744_H0687:141b-28: go rim bzhin du lha ma yin gyi rgyal po
K12D0744_H0687:141b-29: rnams kyi gnas rgya mtsho chen po bri bar bya'o
K12D0744_H0687:141b-30: // blo gros dang ldan pas dpal gyi sgo bri bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:141b-31: rin po che'i rnam pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:142a-4: de rnams kyi gnas rnams thig gis gdab par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:142a-5: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:142a-6: de'i g-yas su lag na rdo rje'o //
K12D0744_H0687:142a-7: de dang nye bar khro bo rdo rje sa 'og
K12D0744_H0687:142a-8: lag par rdo rje dgra ste can gzhag par bya'o
K12D0744_H0687:142a-9: // bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon gyi drung du byang
K12D0744_H0687:142a-10: chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa'i blo gros rnga
K12D0744_H0687:142a-12: de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i 'og tu chung ma
K12D0744_H0687:142a-13: dang bcas pa'i dbang phyug gi mdun du khyu mchog
K12D0744_H0687:142a-14: dang ldan pa gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:142a-15: de nas shar gyi sgor 'phar ma dang po la sman thams cad dang /
K12D0744_H0687:142a-19: gzhon nu ma la sogs pa gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:142a-20: de nas lho'i sgor lha ma yin brgyad gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:142a-29: de nas nub kyi sgor 'khrul 'khor stong sum cu gzhag par bya ste /
K12D0744_H0687:142a-30: de la 'khrul 'khor brgyad rnam pa dang bcas pa bri'o //
K12D0744_H0687:142a-36: mda' dang bcas pa'i gzhu dang /
K12D0744_H0687:142b-0: de nas byang gi sgo'i @142b 'phar mar bu ga
K12D0744_H0687:142b-1: brgyad rnam pa dang bcas pa bri bar bya ste
K12D0744_H0687:142b-9: ma byas pa'i gdong gi rnam pa rnams so //
K12D0744_H0687:142b-10: de nas mtshams rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'og tu sgo bral bzhi gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:142b-11: me'i mtshams su me'i thab khung ngo //
K12D0744_H0687:142b-12: rlung du chu'i thab khung ngo //
K12D0744_H0687:142b-13: bden bral du bdug spos kyi thab khung ngo //
K12D0744_H0687:142b-14: dbang ldan du sbrul gyi rnam pa gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:142b-15: de nas de rnams spyan drangs la rdo rje khro
K12D0744_H0687:142b-16: bo 'bebs pa chen pos byin gyis brlab par bya'o
K12D0744_H0687:142b-17: // bum pa rtsa ba nag po med pa bzhi ljon pa lnga dang /
K12D0744_H0687:142b-19: rin po che lnga dang ldan pa la ras phra ba; dri zhim pa /
K12D0744_H0687:142b-20: skra med pas mgul ba bcings te mtshams bzhi po
K12D0744_H0687:142b-21: rnams su rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa la yungs
K12D0744_H0687:142b-22: kar gyis byin gyis brlabs te gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:142b-23: de nas rdo rje'i chu dang /
K12D0744_H0687:142b-24: phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa'i me tog dang /
K12D0744_H0687:142b-29: de nas sna tshogs pa'i ro dang /
K12D0744_H0687:142b-31: 'bras kyi rgyal po'i 'bras bu legs par sbyar ba /
K12D0744_H0687:142b-33: sha med pa'i lha bshos dang /
K12D0744_H0687:143a-0: gtor ma yid du 'ong ba dam pa rgya chen po'i 'byung po thams cad la phyogs @143a *//
K12D0744_H0687:143a-1: dang mtshams rnams su byin la nye reg bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:143a-2: cho ga bzhin du phyag rgya dang /
K12D0744_H0687:143a-3: dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba byas la khro bo'i rgyal
K12D0744_H0687:143a-4: po dpa' bo gcig pa rdo rje sa 'og rjes
K12D0744_H0687:143a-5: su dran pas bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:143a-6: skyes bu dpa' bos byin gyis brlab pa'i don gyi
K12D0744_H0687:143a-7: phyir lha ma yin gyi phyag rgya'i 'og tu son
K12D0744_H0687:143a-8: par rkang mthil nas spyi gtsug gi bar du go
K12D0744_H0687:143a-13: ras dkar po phra bas gdong g-yogs te lag pa
K12D0744_H0687:143a-14: rdo rje thal mo'i phyag rgya sbyar la las kyi
K12D0744_H0687:143a-15: gru la rkang pa gnyis bzhag ste yon phul la
K12D0744_H0687:143a-16: // rna ba dam tshig gi byin gyis brlabs pas sangs rgyas dang /
K12D0744_H0687:143a-18: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs rnams kyi dam tshig phye ba rnams dang dam tshig mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:143a-19: 'di lta bu'i dam tshig thos nas me tog dor bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:143a-20: gang gi steng du lhung ba de'i lha'i rigs so //
K12D0744_H0687:143a-21: thog mar phyag rgya bcings pas byin gyis brlabs nas de la yon dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:143a-22: de nas rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor bsdus te cho ga bzhin du phyag rgya dang /
K12D0744_H0687:143a-23: sngags lha rnams gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:143a-24: de nas dkyil 'khor mthong nas dam tshig dam pas byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:143b-0: gsang sngags thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs @143b pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:143b-2: 'dod pa'i don thams cad kyi dngos grub thob pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:143b-3: 'dul ba rnams la rab tu sbyor ba dang /
K12D0744_H0687:143b-11: rgyud thams cad kyi don thob pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:143b-17: gdug pa thams cad la drag shul spyod pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:143b-22: rnam pa thams cad du don thams cad grub pa
K12D0744_H0687:143b-23: rnyed pa 'di bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas
K12D0744_H0687:143b-24: bka' stsal to // 'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las /
K12D0744_H0687:143b-25: grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba sa 'og gi
K12D0744_H0687:143b-26: rdo rje dpa' bo gcig pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu
K12D0744_H0687:143b-27: pa'o //// de nas gzhan yang las rgyas pa'i rim par bye ba ni /
K12D0744_H0687:143b-28: rdo rje bsnun pa'i shing las rdo rje byas la 'bum phrag gsum bzla bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:143b-29: de nas zla ba nya ba la mchod pa byas
K12D0744_H0687:143b-30: te lag mthil du bzung la ji srid tsi ti
K12D0744_H0687:143b-31: tsi ti zhes sgrog gi bar du bzla bar bya'o
K12D0744_H0687:143b-35: de nas bud med rnams mchod yon bzung nas 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:143b-36: de nas 'khrul 'khor med par 'jug par byed do //
K12D0744_H0687:144a-0: gang 'dod pa'i rdzas de la ster @144a *//
K12D0744_H0687:144a-1: ro; ;bcom ldan 'das lha'i lhas phyag byas shing mchod pa /
K12D0744_H0687:144a-2: rig pa'i rgyal po chen po'i bdag po dpal dang
K12D0744_H0687:144a-3: ldan pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ma bsgrubs kyang
K12D0744_H0687:144a-5: lha ma yin gyi bu mo la dmigs te bu ga'i sgor stong phrag brgya bzla bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:144a-6: lha ma yin gyi bu mo bskyod par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:144a-7: nad mi bzad pas bzung nas stong phrag brgya po yongs su rdzogs pa 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:144a-8: gal te mi 'ongs na dug dang bsres pa la
K12D0744_H0687:144a-9: yungs kar skya bor sbyar ba'i sreg blugs stong phrag
K12D0744_H0687:144a-10: brgyad seng ldeng gi sol ba la bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:144a-13: k'a ra b'i ra'i me tog dmar pos sreg blugs stong phrag brgyad bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:144a-14: de nas rdo rje la bsnun pas ci nas kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:144a-15: de nas skyes bu dpa' bo'i lag pa nas bzung nas 'jug par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:144a-16: rdo rje lag par bcangs la 'jug par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:144a-17: yang na rdo rjes bsnun pa'i shing la 'khor lo
K12D0744_H0687:144a-18: byas la dur khrod du ni ma pa'i sol ba
K12D0744_H0687:144a-19: la tsha ba'i mar khu dang bsres te sv'ah'a'i yi
K12D0744_H0687:144a-20: ge dang ldan pas stong phrag brgyad sreg blugs bya'o
K12D0744_H0687:144a-24: yungs kar skya bo bsres te stong phrag brgyad sreg
K12D0744_H0687:144a-25: blugs byas pas bu ga'i sgo 'bye bar 'gyur ro
K12D0744_H0687:144a-26: // de nas bu ga'i sgor ba lang gi lci
K12D0744_H0687:144b-0: bas dkyil 'khor @144b nye bar byugs la steng du
K12D0744_H0687:144b-1: // dris byugs te / de nas rdo rje des de'i steng du rdo rje bri bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:144b-2: de nas rdo rje de lag pa g-yas par bzung
K12D0744_H0687:144b-3: la yungs kar la cung zad cig bsngags te stong
K12D0744_H0687:144b-5: ci bde bar rdzas bzung nas 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:144b-8: de rnams dang lhan cig tu 'jug par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:144b-9: yang na gter 'don par 'dod pas lcags las byas
K12D0744_H0687:144b-10: pa'i phur bu bzhi la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
K12D0744_H0687:144b-11: bzlas te phyogs bzhir btab la gsang sngags bzla bar
K12D0744_H0687:144b-12: bya'o // de nas der gter 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:144b-14: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal to //
K12D0744_H0687:144b-15: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0744_H0687:144b-16: na ma shtsa nada badzra p'a na ye /
K12D0744_H0687:144b-17: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
K12D0744_H0687:144b-23: li ni h'um phat h'um phat sv'a h'a /
K12D0744_H0687:144b-24: rdo rjes bsnun pa'i shing la sor brgyad pa'i rdo
K12D0744_H0687:144b-25: rje rtse gcig pa byas te tsandan dmar po las
K12D0744_H0687:144b-26: byas pa'i rdo rje'i rnam pa sor bcu drug pa'i
K12D0744_H0687:144b-27: stan byas la de'i steng du rdo rje bzhag la
K12D0744_H0687:144b-28: gso sbyong dang ldan pas thams cad la tsandan gyi
K12D0744_H0687:144b-29: rang bzhin du byas te dpal gyi sgor gzhag par
K12D0744_H0687:144b-32: slong ba za zhing 'bum phrag gsum bzla bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:144b-33: de nas 'khrul 'khor thams cad ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:144b-34: de rnams rang nyid 'ongs nas 'jug par byed do //
K12D0744_H0687:144b-35: gal te de rnams ma 'ongs na /
K12D0744_H0687:145a-4: khrag bsres pas stong phrag brgyad bzung la re re
K12D0744_H0687:145a-5: la yongs su bzlas te rdo rje la bsnun pas
K12D0744_H0687:145a-6: de nas 'ongs te lag nas bzung nas 'jug par
K12D0744_H0687:145a-7: byed do // skyes bu dpa' bos las su gyur
K12D0744_H0687:145a-8: pa gzhan yang dug dang khrag bsres pas stong phrag
K12D0744_H0687:145a-9: brgyad sreg blugs byas pas de nas 'ong bar 'gyur
K12D0744_H0687:145a-10: byed do // ro // rdo rje bzung la 'jug par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:145a-11: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal to //
K12D0744_H0687:145a-12: de nas las gzhan yang bshad par bya ste /
K12D0744_H0687:145a-13: lo ma la sogs pa za zhing dus gsum du
K12D0744_H0687:145a-14: khrus byas la mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs kyis 'bum
K12D0744_H0687:145a-16: de nas rdo rjes bsnun pa'i shing la mthe bong
K12D0744_H0687:145a-17: tsam gyi rdo rje cha shas bcu drug pa rtse
K12D0744_H0687:145a-18: mo gsum pa byas te tsandan dmar ba'i khri la
K12D0744_H0687:145a-19: rdo rje de gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:145a-20: me tog dmar po dag dri la sogs pa rnams
K12D0744_H0687:145a-21: kyis mchod de gtor ma byin la nyin mtshan du
K12D0744_H0687:145a-22: gso sbyong dang ldan pas k'a ra b'i ra'i me
K12D0744_H0687:145a-23: tog gis rdo rje la brgyad brgyar bsnun par bya'o
K12D0744_H0687:145a-24: // de nas rnam pa gsum 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12D0744_H0687:145a-25: rdo rje la tsi ti tsi ti 'byung ba dang /
K12D0744_H0687:145a-26: bu gar du ba'i sdong bu 'byung ba dang /
K12D0744_H0687:145a-27: gzhon nu ma rnams 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:145a-28: gang gi tshe zhugs shig ces smra na /
K12D0744_H0687:145a-29: de nas 'jug pa'i dus su nyin mtshan du gso
K12D0744_H0687:145b-0: sbyong la gnas pas @145b ltas brtag par bya ste
K12D0744_H0687:145b-1: / gang gi tshe rdo rje la tsi ti tsi ti zhes sgrog na /
K12D0744_H0687:145b-3: gang gi tshad du ba 'byung bar mthong na /

K12D0744_H0687:150b-1: mngon spyod la stegs bu gru gsum pa bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:150b-4: sgrub pa chen po la padma'i rnam pa'o //
K12D0744_H0687:150b-5: dbang du bya ba la lcags kyu'i rnam pa'o //
K12D0744_H0687:150b-6: rig pa dang lhan cig tu dri zhim po'i me tog dang /
K12D0744_H0687:150b-8: mngon spyod la dur khrod kyi shing la tsha ba gsum dang /
K12D0744_H0687:150b-12: thal ba dang khrag la sogs pas khro bo la sreg blugs bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:150b-13: zhi ba la sman gyi ljon pa'i yam shing gis so //
K12D0744_H0687:150b-14: rgyas pa la 'o ma can gyi yam shing gis so //
K12D0744_H0687:150b-15: zhi ba la me tog dang dri dkar pos so //
K12D0744_H0687:150b-16: rgyas pa la me tog dang dri ser pos so //
K12D0744_H0687:150b-17: mngon spyod la me tog dang dri dmar pos so //
K12D0744_H0687:150b-18: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal ba dang ldan pa'i sngags kyis thun gsum du las bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:150b-19: sgrub pa chen po la dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal ba dang ldan pas las bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:150b-20: zhi ba la skyil krung gis so //
K12D0744_H0687:150b-21: rgyas pa la tsog pus so //
K12D0744_H0687:150b-22: mngon spyod la rkang pas rkang pa mnan pas so //
K12D0744_H0687:150b-23: zas mi za bar sreg blugs bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:150b-25: zhi ba la h'um gi yi ge bzla'o //
K12D0744_H0687:150b-26: mngon spyod la phat kyi yi ge'o //
K12D0744_H0687:150b-27: zhi ba la srod kyi thun la'o; ;rgyas pa la snga dro'i thun la'o //
K12D0744_H0687:150b-28: mngon spyod la nyi ma gung ngam nam gung gi dus su kha lhor bltas te las bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:150b-29: sgrub pa chen po dang zhi ba la kha shar du phyogs pas so //
K12D0744_H0687:151a-0: @151a *// rgyas pa la byang du phyogs pas so //
K12D0744_H0687:151a-1: dbang du bya ba la byang du phyogs pas so //
K12D0744_H0687:151a-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lha la mchod pa byas te rgyas pa'i las bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:151a-4: rtags gcig par dbang du bya ba la mngon spyod do //
K12D0744_H0687:151a-5: zhi ba la sogs pa la me spar te bya'o //

K12D0744_H0687:151a-9: thog mar de ltar ma byas na /

K12D0744_H0687:151a-12: tog dkar po dang ldan pa la sangs rgyas bcom
K12D0744_H0687:151a-13: ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs te gsang sngags brgyad
K12D0744_H0687:151a-15: sgrub pa chen po 'byung ba'i mtshan ma rnams 'byung ste /
K12D0744_H0687:151a-16: glo bur du dung gi sgra'am /
K12D0744_H0687:151a-19: de nas rig pa'i lha 'ongs par shes par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:151a-21: bcom ldan 'das spyan dang lhan cig pa la sngar bzhin du mchod yon bzung ste brgyad brgya bzla'o //
K12D0744_H0687:151a-25: phyogs bcings la gtor ma dang /
K12D0744_H0687:151a-28: ldong ros la sogs pa rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:151b-0: sngon @151b du sbyangs te phyis bsgrub par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:151b-2: ldong ros la sogs pa rnams la nyin mtshan du 'o mas bran zhing gzhag go /
K12D0744_H0687:151b-3: de nas bton la ji ltar nus pas dge 'dun la dga' ston bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:151b-4: skar ma rgyal la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi
K12D0744_H0687:151b-5: spyan sngar mchod pas mchod la ras dkar po ma
K12D0744_H0687:151b-6: nyams pas g-yogs te bsod nams mchod la brtag par
K12D0744_H0687:151b-7: bya'o // brtags pa na sngon gyi mtshan ma byung na /
K12D0744_H0687:151b-9: mtshan ma gzhan yang sil snyan gyi sgra dang /
K12D0744_H0687:151b-12: sil snyan gyi sgras rig pa 'dzin pa chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:151b-13: rgyal ba'i sgras mkha' la 'gro ba 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:151b-14: dung gi sgras dbang du byed pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:151b-15: rdzas btags te ming med kyis ril bu lnga bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:151b-16: ras ma nyams pa'i steng du bzhag ste grib ma la bskam par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:151b-17: de nas aa shvattha'i shing gi steng du bzhag nas zhag bdun du lhag par gnas par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:151b-18: de nas thog ma sgrub pa'i nyin mo snga dro'i
K12D0744_H0687:151b-19: tshe yongs su lhung bas bsnun pa la lan stong
K12D0744_H0687:151b-21: de nas phye ma red sgrub pa la 'jug par
K12D0744_H0687:151b-22: bya ste; aa shvattha'i lo ma bzhi g-yas bskor du
K12D0744_H0687:151b-23: bskor ba la bzhag ste gsum gyis dgab bo //
K12D0744_H0687:151b-24: aa shvattha'i lo ma rnams 'di lta bu'i gnas nas blang bar bya ste /
K12D0744_H0687:152a-1: gyi grib mas ma phog pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:152a-2: lha'i khang pas ma phog pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:152a-3: dur khrod du skyes pa rnams kyi aa shvattha'i lo ma yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:152a-4: de dag las gzhan gnas bsngags pa'i aa shvattha'i shing
K12D0744_H0687:152a-5: gi lo ma rtse mo dkar po rnams kyi steng
K12D0744_H0687:152a-6: du grub pa'i rdzas cha gsum du byas te bla
K12D0744_H0687:152a-11: ral gri rnams su blos brtags nas de dag thun tshod lngar yongs su bskams te /
K12D0744_H0687:152a-12: de nas pa lang gi lci ba'i tshogs kyi dbus
K12D0744_H0687:152a-13: su bcug la zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu gzhag
K12D0744_H0687:152a-14: go / de nas bton te ba'i rnam lngas bkrus
K12D0744_H0687:152a-15: la de nyid du zhag bdun lhag par gnas par
K12D0744_H0687:152a-16: byas te yongs su ltung bas bsnun pa la stong
K12D0744_H0687:152a-17: phrag brgyad yongs su bzlas la /
K12D0744_H0687:152a-18: de nas sgrub pa la 'jug go /
K12D0744_H0687:152a-22: lo dra rnams bsres la bcom ldan 'das spyan ma'i snying po stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags te /
K12D0744_H0687:152a-23: sgrub pa'i dus su mig la byugs pas gnyid mi 'byung ngo //
K12D0744_H0687:152a-24: gzhan yang sman du gyur pa ni /
K12D0744_H0687:152a-25: aa ba marga dkar po'i rtsa ba dang /
K12D0744_H0687:152a-32: thog mar ring bsrel can gyi mchod rten gyi mdun
K12D0744_H0687:152b-0: du zhag gsum du smyung ba byas te rda @152b
K12D0744_H0687:152b-1: rje go cha'i sngags stong phrag brgyad mngon par bsngags
K12D0744_H0687:152b-2: so // de nas sgrub pa'i dus su ba lang
K12D0744_H0687:152b-3: gi gcin dang btags te lus la yongs su bskus
K12D0744_H0687:152b-9: log 'dren thams cad kyis rgyang nas 'od dang ldan pa'i me'i phung po ltar 'bar bar mthong ste /
K12D0744_H0687:152b-11: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi rigs rnams mtshungs par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:152b-12: gang gi tshe rig pa 'dzin pas rdzas grub par gyur na /
K12D0744_H0687:152b-13: de nas sngon bzhin bcom ldan 'das spyan ma'i sngags
K12D0744_H0687:152b-14: kyis me tog dkar po la brgyad brgya bzlas la
K12D0744_H0687:152b-15: rdzas kyi dbus su bcug pas rdzas brtan par 'gyur
K12D0744_H0687:152b-16: ro // gzhan du na dngos grub 'phrog par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:152b-17: gal te rig pa 'dzin pas gsang sngags grub par ma gyur na /
K12D0744_H0687:152b-18: rig pa 'dzin pa des 'di ltar bya ste /
K12D0744_H0687:152b-19: rgya mtsho chen por 'bab pa'i chu bo'i 'gram du
K12D0744_H0687:152b-20: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi
K12D0744_H0687:152b-21: mchod rten khru gang ba brgyad brgya byas la /
K12D0744_H0687:152b-22: mchod rten re re la ji ltar nus pa'i dri dang /
K12D0744_H0687:152b-24: bdug spos phul te dus gsum du byang chub kyi
K12D0744_H0687:152b-25: sems bskyed la sdig pa bshags te re re'i mdun
K12D0744_H0687:152b-28: gal te mtshan ma ma byung na /
K12D0744_H0687:152b-29: cho ga 'dis mchod rten stong phrag gcig byas te /
K12D0744_H0687:153a-1: phyogs ma yin pa'i mchod rten 'bar na /
K12D0744_H0687:153a-2: las kyi sgrib pa zad par shes par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:153a-3: de nas gang ci sgrub pa de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:153a-4: sgrub pa chen po brtsams nas las gzhan dbab pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:153a-5: gsod pa la sogs pa rnams mi bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:153a-15: spo nag pa rnams kyis sgrub pa chen po 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:153a-16: gzhan gza' la sogs pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:153a-17: mi gang sangs rgyas dang chos la dad pa dang ldan pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:153a-19: sen mo zangs kyi mdog can dang ldan pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:153a-20: pha ma la gus pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:153a-21: bla ma la sri zhu che ba des thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:153a-22: rig pa 'dzin pas sngags sgrub pa sngon bzhin sgrub pa dang ldan na /
K12D0744_H0687:153a-23: tshe'i dus byas kyang gang 'dod pa sems shing shibs /
K12D0744_H0687:153a-24: de shi ba tsam gyis de dang der skye bar 'gyur te /
K12D0744_H0687:153a-25: rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'am /
K12D0744_H0687:153a-26: yang na rig pa 'dzin pa'i rigs sam /
K12D0744_H0687:153a-27: dbang phyug chen po'i rigs sam /
K12D0744_H0687:153a-28: gdol pa'i rigs 'dzin pa'i rigs de lta bu'i rim
K12D0744_H0687:153a-29: pa gang 'dod pa'i bsam pas sngags bsgrubs pas de
K12D0744_H0687:153a-30: lta bu'i rigs su 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:153b-0: sgrub @153b pa chen po la 'bad pa'i rig pa 'dzin pas rdo rje dang /
K12D0744_H0687:153b-10: spyi blugs la sogs pa rnams la rkang pas brdzi bar mi bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:153b-11: sa la bris pa yang de bzhin du bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:153b-12: 'di ltar rdo rje 'chang ba'i rdo rje dang /
K12D0744_H0687:153b-14: lha chen po'i rtsa gsum dang /
K12D0744_H0687:153b-19: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi padma dang /
K12D0744_H0687:153b-20: rdo rje lcags kyu'i lcags kyu dang /
K12D0744_H0687:153b-22: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub gang thob par 'dod
K12D0744_H0687:153b-23: pas bdag nyid kyis rdo rje la sogs pa de
K12D0744_H0687:153b-24: dang de dag phyag rgya chen po'i rkang pas brdzi
K12D0744_H0687:153b-25: bar mi bya'o // gang gi tshe rig pa 'dzin
K12D0744_H0687:153b-26: pa'i gsang sngags bsgrubs pa na rig pa'i lha dngos
K12D0744_H0687:153b-28: des las 'dis rig pa mnyes par bya ste; dri
K12D0744_H0687:153b-29: thams cad kyis rig pa'i lha'i gzugs brnyan byas la
K12D0744_H0687:153b-30: / bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi
K12D0744_H0687:153b-31: drung du bzhag ste zhag gsum du myung bar gnas
K12D0744_H0687:153b-33: nag po'i bcu bzhi la spyan dang lhan cig pa'i
K12D0744_H0687:153b-34: rig sngags kyis sna ma'i me tog stong phrag brgyad
K12D0744_H0687:153b-35: de'i gzugs brnyan gyi snying gar brdeg par bya zhing
K12D0744_H0687:154a-1: bsres pas stong phrag brgyad sreg blugs byas la /
K12D0744_H0687:154a-2: de nyid du 'khod de ji ltar nus pa'i mchod pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:154a-4: de nas rig pa 'dzin pa de rangs pas gnyid log pa dang /
K12D0744_H0687:154a-6: rjes su gdams pa ston par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:154a-8: nyi ma phyi ma la de bzhin du gtor ma'i
K12D0744_H0687:154a-9: cho ga byas te rdo rje khro bo dang lhan
K12D0744_H0687:154a-10: cig tu stong phrag brgyad bzla'o //
K12D0744_H0687:154a-11: de nas rig pa'i lha de nyid khro bo dang
K12D0744_H0687:154a-12: lhan cig tu rmi lam du mthong nas chad pa
K12D0744_H0687:154a-15: yi ge gzhan du gyur pa yang stong par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:154a-16: gal te yongs su rdzogs par gyur na /
K12D0744_H0687:154a-17: de nas dngos grub ster bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:154a-18: sgrub pa dang po la las 'di mi bya la ji srid lan bdun bsgrubs kyang ma grub na /
K12D0744_H0687:154a-20: de nas rdzas sgrub pa'i dus su gyur na /
K12D0744_H0687:154a-23: nyi ma shar ba na rig pa 'dzin pas rmi
K12D0744_H0687:154a-24: lam lta bur gsang sngags gang 'dod pa yid la
K12D0744_H0687:154a-26: gzhan du na log par 'dren pa rnams zhugs par
K12D0744_H0687:154a-27: gyur nas rig pa'i lha mngon du mi 'gyur ro
K12D0744_H0687:154a-28: // gzhan gyi gos la reg par mi bya zhing
K12D0744_H0687:154a-29: bgo ba gsum byas te gcig gyon la khrus bya'o
K12D0744_H0687:154b-0: gsum @154b pas mtshan mo gyon par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:154b-1: skyil krung gis gnas te rig pa'i lha'i mtshan ma mthong nas til dang /
K12D0744_H0687:154b-2: mar bsres pa'i sreg blugs bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:154b-9: chang btung bar mi bya ste /
K12D0744_H0687:154b-10: nyes pa des log par 'dren pa rnams kyis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:154b-13: dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur ba dang ldan pas byang
K12D0744_H0687:154b-14: chub kyi sems chen po bskyed par bya'o; ;dam tshig
K12D0744_H0687:154b-15: shes par gyur pas 'di ltar byas na /
K12D0744_H0687:154b-16: ring po mi thogs par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:154b-17: rig pa 'dzin pas sngar bshad par bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:154b-18: rtag tu lha thams cad la bdug dang /
K12D0744_H0687:154b-19: lha bshos kyi 'bras chen rang gi lag gis dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:154b-20: zlos pa na kha shar du phyogs te bris sku bris pa'i sngon du bzla bar bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:154b-21: bris sku'i tshad chen po khru bcu pa'i ras la'o //
K12D0744_H0687:154b-25: skams 'dir rig pa 'dzin pas sngar bshad pa rnams bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:154b-26: gal te brgya la rdzas sam /
K12D0744_H0687:154b-29: de gzung bar mi bya ste /
K12D0744_H0687:154b-30: 'bras bu tsam bzung na yang gsang sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0744_H0687:155a-0: chu nyung dus bkru bar mi bya zhing rkang pas me la reg @155a *//
K12D0744_H0687:155a-2: sen mos sa la ri mo bri bar mi bya zhing /
K12D0744_H0687:155a-3: lha'i khang pa'i grib ma la 'gom par mi bya ste /
K12D0744_H0687:155a-4: 'di lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan zhing de dag
K12D0744_H0687:155a-5: dor ba'i sngags pas myur du rig sngags 'grub par
K12D0744_H0687:155a-6: 'gyur ro // 'phags pa rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las /
K12D0744_H0687:155a-7: rig sngags kyis 'dul ba zhes bya ba rdo rje
K12D0744_H0687:155a-8: khro bos yongs su zhus pa'i le'u ste nyi shu
K12D0744_H0687:155a-9: gsum pa'o //// de ru 'bad pas 'jug pa na //
K12D0744_H0687:155a-10: khang bzang dam brnyed pa yis //
K12D0744_H0687:155a-11: bstan bcos las ni nges bzhin pa'i //
K12D0744_H0687:155a-12: phyogs kyi cha ni rib bshad bya //
K12D0744_H0687:155a-13: shar na n+ya gro dha yi shing //
K12D0744_H0687:155a-14: dbang ldan du ni pa laksha //
K12D0744_H0687:155a-15: lho ru yang na aa shvttha'i //
K12D0744_H0687:155a-16: nub tu de bzhin pa laksha //
K12D0744_H0687:155a-17: byang chub du ljon shing ma du ga /
K12D0744_H0687:155a-18: gnas rnams su ni gdon mi za //
K12D0744_H0687:155a-19: gang dag tu ni shing med na //
K12D0744_H0687:155a-20: de la yang ni mtshan bzang po //
K12D0744_H0687:155a-21: shar na gzhan pa'i lus gcig ste //
K12D0744_H0687:155a-22: lho ru yang ni bzhi ru 'gyur //
K12D0744_H0687:155a-23: nub tu gsum du bstan pa ste //
K12D0744_H0687:155a-24: byang du gnyis su bsgrags pa'o //
K12D0744_H0687:155a-25: mdzes pa'i bu mo rtag tu gnas //
K12D0744_H0687:155a-26: grub pa'i rdzas dang dngul chu ni //
K12D0744_H0687:155a-27: lha yi byang na rtag tu yang //
K12D0744_H0687:155a-28: dngul chu ru ni shes par bya; ;dbang ldan du yang dngul chu ste //
K12D0744_H0687:155a-29: dbang por rdzas ni de bzhin no //
K12D0744_H0687:155a-30: chu lhar rtag tu rdzas bzang po //
K12D0744_H0687:155a-31: grub pa'i rdzas ni bla na med //
K12D0744_H0687:155a-32: bden bral du ni ral grir 'gyur //
K12D0744_H0687:155b-0: @155b gshin rjer de bzhin mig sman nyid //
K12D0744_H0687:155b-1: rlung gi phyogs su rtag gnas pa //
K12D0744_H0687:155b-2: yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya'o //
K12D0744_H0687:155b-3: lha nyid kyi ni mdun du yang //
K12D0744_H0687:155b-4: 'bab stegs can gyi rdzing bur bstan //
K12D0744_H0687:155b-5: khang bzang gi ni nang na yang //
K12D0744_H0687:155b-6: grub pa'i rdzas la the tshom med //
K12D0744_H0687:155b-7: lho yi sgo ru gang gyur pa //
K12D0744_H0687:155b-8: lho yi phyogs su mngon phyogs pa //
K12D0744_H0687:155b-9: de na rdzas rnams thams cad de //
K12D0744_H0687:155b-10: lha yi khang par rnam par bstan //
K12D0744_H0687:155b-11: dbang po'i phyogs su mngon phyogs pa //
K12D0744_H0687:155b-12: de nas rdzas rnams kun bsdus pa'o //
K12D0744_H0687:155b-13: byang du phyogs te legs gnas pa //
K12D0744_H0687:155b-14: bris skus bkab pa'i rdzas su bshad; ;nub tu phyogs te legs gnas pa //
K12D0744_H0687:155b-15: de na yang ni bsgribs nas gnas //
